subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Rigoberto Uran of Colombia won the first big mountain stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Vincenzo Nibali of Italy finished third and kept the overall lead.
snippet: Rigoberto Uran of Colombia won the first big mountain stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Vincenzo Nibali of Italy finished third and kept the overall lead.
